This is how you make the chapter cover art cover the entire page, including the header and footer

```{=typst}
#set page(foreground: image("chapters/ch1_start.jpg", width: 100%, height: 100%))
```

# Chapter 1

```{=typst}
#pagebreak()
```

```{=typst}
#set page(foreground: none)
```
